metadata.title: Craft Sportswear Men's Performance Bike Cycling Feather Light Reflective Wind Protective Jacket: protective/riding/cooling/coat/outerwear
description: The Craft PB Featherlight Jacket stuffs easily in your jersey pocket when the sun finally warms your afternoon spin. The polyester Craft PB Featherlight Jacket features an ergonomic cut for in-the-saddle comfort, while the wind-protective material keeps you from freezing. Slim construction prevents flapping on the descent and the small back pocket carries an extra set of gloves for when the weather really starts to change.Ultra-lightweight construction makes pocket-stuffing possible Reflective print for safety in low light Small back pocket doubles as a stow pocket
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "12 x 12 x 12 inches; 4.16 Ounces", "Item model number": "1901283-2310", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "January 27, 2013", "Manufacturer": "Craft"}
